mapper.update:
update ${tabName} set
order_type = #{orderType},
order_status = #{orderStatus},
status = #{status},
modified_time = now(), modified_id = #{modifyId} where id = #{id} and deleted = 0
update ${tabName} set manage_id = #{manageId}, modified_time = now(), modified_id = #{modifiedId} where id = #{id} and deleted = 0
UPDATE ${tabName} SET receiver = #{manageId}, receive_time = now(), modified_id = #{modifiedId}, modified_time = now() WHERE id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: select * from c_order_fixed where id = #{id} and deleted = 0
select * from c_order_fixed where order_id = #{orderId} and deleted = 0 and type = #{type}
select * from c_order_auction where order_id = #{orderId} and deleted = 0 and type = #{type}
select * from c_order_appoint where order_id = #{orderId} and deleted = 0 and type = #{type}
select * from c_order_appoint where id = #{id} and deleted = 0
select * from c_order_lowprice where order_id = #{orderId} and deleted = 0 and type = #{type}
select order_type from ${tabName} where id = #{id} and deleted = 0

select o.credit, a.deadline as limit_date, a.name as applicant_name, a.phone as applicant_phone, l.company_name as company_name, o.created_time as applicant_time from m_order_info o left join m_applicant_info a on o.applicant_info = a.id left join m_license_info l on o.license_info = l.id where o.id = #{orderId}

select a.loan_amount as credit, a.loan_period as limit_date , f.contact_name as applicant_name, f.contact_phone as applicant_phone, c.company_name as conpany_name, f.created_time as applicant_time from m_product_fast_info f left join m_applicant_fast_info a on f.applicant_fast_id = a.applicant_fast_id left join m_company_fast_info c on f.company_fast_id = c.company_fast_id where f.id = #{fastId}

select l.business_registration_type as company_type, c.person_num as person_num, b.sales, timestampdiff(year, c.business_start_time , now()) as run_year, o.credit, a.guarantee as guarantee_type, a.two_year_credit as two_year_credit, d.guaranty as collateral, a.deadline as limit_date, b.vat_amount as total_vet from m_order_info o left join m_debt_info d on o.debt_info = d.id
left join m_license_info l on o.license_info = l.id
left join m_control_info c on o.control_info = c.id left join m_business_info b on o.id = b.target_id and b.target_type = '2' and b.year = '2015' left join m_applicant_info a on o.applicant_info = a.id
where o.id = #{orderId}

select f.id, c.company_type as company_type, c.staff_number as person_num, c.year_turnover as sales, a.management_life as run_year, a.loan_amount as credit, a.two_year_credit as two_year_credit, a.loan_period as limit_date from m_product_fast_info f left join m_applicant_fast_info a on f.applicant_fast_id = a.applicant_fast_id left join m_company_fast_info c on f.company_fast_id = c.company_fast_id where id = #{fastId}

select f.id, f.price, f.start_time, f.end_time, f.order_id, s2.select_value as company_type, f.person_num, f.sales, f.run_year, f.credit, s3.select_value as guarantee_type, s.select_value as two_year_credit, s1.select_value as collateral, f.limit_date, f.total_vat, a.name as applicant_name from c_order_fixed f left join m_select_info s on s.select_key = f.two_year_credit and s.type_code = 'credit_type' left join m_select_info s1 on s1.select_key = f.collateral and s1.type_code = 'collateral_type' left join m_select_info s3 on s3.select_key = f.guarantee_type and s3.type_code = 'guarantee_type' left join m_select_info s2 on s2.select_key = f.company_type and s2.type_code = 'business_type'
left join m_order_info o on o.id = f.order_id left join m_applicant_info a on o.applicant_info = a.id where f.deleted = 0 and f.manage_id is null and f.type = 1 and o.`status` in (6,7,8,9,10,11)
and #{search.collateral} = f.collateral
and #{search.twoYearCredit} = f.two_year_credit
union all
select f.id, f.price, f.start_time, f.end_time, f.order_id, s2.select_value as company_type, f.person_num, f.sales, f.run_year, f.credit, s3.select_value as guarantee_type, s.select_value as two_year_credit, s1.select_value as collateral, f.limit_date, f.total_vat, fa.contact_name as applicant_name from c_order_fixed f left join m_select_info s on s.select_key = f.two_year_credit and s.type_code = 'credit_type' left join m_select_info s1 on s1.select_key = f.collateral and s1.type_code = 'collateral_type' left join m_select_info s3 on s3.select_key = f.guarantee_type and s3.type_code = 'guarantee_type' left join m_select_info s2 on s2.select_key = f.company_type and s2.type_code = 'business_type'
left join m_product_fast_info fa on fa.id = f.order_id
where f.deleted = 0 and f.manage_id is null and f.type = 2 and fa.status in (6,7,8,9,10,11)
and #{search.collateral} = f.collateral
and #{search.twoYearCredit} = f.two_year_credit
limit #{pageNo}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) from c_order_fixed f LEFT JOIN m_product_fast_info fa ON fa.id = f.order_id AND f.type = 2 LEFT JOIN m_order_info o ON o.id = f.order_id AND f.type = 1
where f.deleted = 0 and f.manage_id is null AND (fa.`status` IN (6,7,8,9,10,11) OR o.`status` IN (6,7,8,9,10,11))
and #{search.collateral} = f.collateral
and #{search.twoYearCredit} = f.two_year_credit

select.foreach: select select_key as `key`, select_value as value, ((SELECT count(*) FROM c_order_appoint f LEFT JOIN m_order_info o on o.id = f.order_id and o.order_type = '4' WHERE o.deleted = 0 and o.status = #{id} and o.order_status != 1 AND f.type = 1 and f.deleted = 0 and f.manage_id = #{manageId} )+( SELECT count(*) FROM c_order_appoint f LEFT JOIN m_product_fast_info o on o.id = f.order_id and o.order_type = '4' WHERE o.deleted = 0 and o.`status` = #{id} and o.order_status != 1 AND f.type = 2 and f.deleted = 0 and f.manage_id = #{manageId} )) as num from m_select_info where type_code = #{typeCode} and select_key = #{id}

select select_key as `key`, select_value as value, ((
SELECT count(*) FROM c_order_appoint f LEFT JOIN m_order_info o on o.id = f.order_id and o.order_type = '4' and o.deleted = 0 WHERE o.deleted = 0 and o.`status` = #{id} and o.order_status = 1 AND f.type = 1 and f.deleted = 0 and f.manage_id = #{manageId} )+(
SELECT count(*) FROM c_order_appoint f LEFT JOIN m_product_fast_info o on o.id = f.order_id and o.order_type = '4' and o.deleted = 0 WHERE o.deleted = 0 and o.`status` = #{id} and o.order_status = 1 AND f.type = 2 and f.deleted = 0 and f.manage_id = #{manageId} )+(
SELECT count(*) FROM c_order_fixed f LEFT JOIN m_order_info o on o.id = f.order_id and o.order_type = '1' and o.deleted = 0 WHERE o.deleted = 0 and o.`status` = #{id} and o.order_status = 1 AND f.type = 1 and f.deleted = 0 and f.manage_id = #{manageId} )+(
SELECT count(*) FROM c_order_fixed f LEFT JOIN m_product_fast_info o on o.id = f.order_id and o.order_type = '1' and o.deleted = 0 WHERE o.deleted = 0 and o.`status` = #{id} and o.order_status = 1 AND f.type = 2 and f.deleted = 0 and f.manage_id = #{manageId} )) as num from m_select_info where type_code = #{typeCode} and select_key = #{id}

mapper.select: select o.id as id, c.type as type, d.`name` as productName, b.name as organization, c.credit as credit, c.limit_date as limitDate, ap.name as applicantName, ap.phone as applicantPhone, l.company_name as companyName, o.created_time as applicantTime, s.select_value status, o.status orderStatus, o.blank_audite_remark as remark, o.credit_real as creditReal, o.audite_time as receiveTime from c_order_fixed c left join m_order_info o on o.id = c.order_id and o.deleted = 0 left join m_select_info s on s.type_code = 'order_status' and s.select_key = o.status left join m_product_info d on d.id = o.product_info left join m_organization_info b on o.bank = b.id left join m_license_info l on o.license_info = l.id left join m_applicant_info ap on ap.id = o.applicant_info where c.id = #{customerId} and c.deleted = 0 and c.type = 1

select o.id as id, c.type as type, p.name as productInfo, b.name as organization, c.credit as credit, c.limit_date as limitDate, o.contact_name as applicantName, o.contact_phone as applicantPhone, o.company as companyName, o.created_time as applicantTime,
s.select_value status,
o.status orderStatus, o.blank_audite_remark as remark, o.credit_real as creditReal, o.receive_time as receiveTime from c_order_fixed c left join m_product_fast_info o on o.id = c.order_id and o.deleted = 0 left join m_product_info p on p.id = o.product_id left join m_organization_info b on b.id = p.bank
left join m_select_info s on s.type_code = 'order_status' and s.select_key = o.status
left join c_manager_info m on m.id = c.manage_id left join m_applicant_fast_info f on f.applicant_fast_id = o.applicant_fast_id
where c.id = #{customerId} and c.deleted = 0 and c.type = 2

select o.id as id, c.type as type, d.`name` as productInfo, b.name as organization, c.credit as credit, c.limit_date as limitDate, c.applicant_name as applicantName, c.applicant_phone as applicantPhone, c.company_name as companyName, c.applicant_time as applicantTime, s.select_value status, o.status orderStatus, o.blank_audite_remark as remark, o.credit_real as creditReal, o.audite_time as receiveTime from c_order_appoint c left join m_order_info o on o.id = c.order_id and o.deleted = 0 left join m_product_info d on d.id = o.product_info left join m_organization_info b on o.bank = b.id left join m_select_info s on s.type_code = 'order_status' and s.select_key = o.status where c.id = #{customerId} and c.deleted = 0 and c.type = 1

select o.id as id, c.type as type, p.name as productName, b.name as organization, c.credit as credit, c.limit_date as limitDate, c.applicant_name as applicantName, c.applicant_phone as applicantPhone, c.company_name as companyName, c.applicant_time as applicantTime, s.select_value status, o.status orderStatus, o.blank_audite_remark as remark, o.credit_real as creditReal, o.receive_time as receiveTime from c_order_appoint c left join m_product_fast_info o on o.id = c.order_id and o.deleted = 0 left join m_select_info s on s.type_code = 'order_status' and s.select_key = o.status left join m_product_info p on p.id = o.product_id left join m_organization_info b on b.id = p.bank where c.id = #{customerId} and c.deleted = 0 and c.type = 2
